channel.title: Webclient Making problem please HELP!
channel.description:
[b]Hello Please help if you made a webclient[/b]
Ok here i go im using SWATs client and im trying to make into a webclient and im using JARmaker Heres what i have done in JARmaker..
(i downloaded the new Class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 folder and uploaded image from photo bucket properly)
[b] Name of Jar i made:[/b] whateveryouwant.jar [b]Output file:[/b] C:\Documents and Settings\(my Name)\Desktop\csk-client [b]Input file:[/b] C:\Documents and Settings\(my Name)\Desktop\csk-client [b]Manifest Template[/b]: Main class: client [b]CREATED JAR[/b]
[b] SIGNING [/b]
[b]Signed JAR file:[/b]signed_whateveryouwant [b]Jarsigner location:[/b]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\jarsigner.exe [i] Generate Keystore:[/i] [b]Keytool location:[/b]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\keytool.exe [b]Output keystore file:[/b]C:\Documents and Settings\King Cam\Desktop\csk-client\keystore [b]Keystore Alias:[/b]Paupau_GTS [b]Public key:[/b]123456 [b]Private key:[/b]1234567 [i] I LEFT THE REST [/i] [u] Generated keystore[/u] [b] FIlled in alias and both keys Signed jar...[/b] ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ [b]If you see i did anything wrong above please let me know its vital[/b] ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^^ ^ ^ ^ ^ I go into my client.. See The keystore, the jar (whateveryouwant.jar) the signed jar (signed_whateveryouwant.jar)
Then i try to double click run and it says error loading.. Then i double click the jar i made error loading Then double click the signed jar i made error loading
Error msg.. Sorry an error occured whilst loading telescape
[b]To fix this try the following in order
1. Try closing all web browser windows and reloading.
2.Try clearing your web browsers cache from tools> internet options
3.Try using a different game world
4.Try rebooting your computer
5.Try selecting a different version of java from the play-game menu[/b]
[i]Please help.. i really want to get it to work :( :([/i]

item.title: Webclient Making problem please HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Tenacious_T Tenacious T
item.description:
@Tenacious_T wrote:

Telescope? is that the name of you image? if so then you need to code client.java to pic up that image instead of the one that it is currently picking up

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Making problem please HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Camranrev Camranrev
item.description:
@Camranrev wrote:

Hello Please help if you made a webclient

Ok here i go im using SWATs client and im trying to make into a webclient and im
using JARmaker Heres what i have done in JARmaker…

(i downloaded the new Class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 folder and uploaded image from photo bucket properly)

Name of Jar i made: whateveryouwant.jar
Output file: C:\Documents and Settings(my Name)\Desktop\csk-client
Input file: C:\Documents and Settings(my Name)\Desktop\csk-client
Manifest Template: Main class: client
CREATED JAR

SIGNING

Signed JAR file:signed_whateveryouwant
Jarsigner location:C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\jarsigner.exe
Generate Keystore:
Keytool location:C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\keytool.exe
Output keystore file:C:\Documents and Settings\King Cam\Desktop\csk-client\keystore
Keystore Alias:Paupau_GTS
Public key:123456
Private key:1234567
I LEFT THE REST
Generated keystore
FIlled in alias and both keys
Signed jar…
^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^
If you see i did anything wrong above please let me know its vital
^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^^ ^ ^ ^ ^
I go into my client…
See The keystore, the jar (whateveryouwant.jar) the signed jar (signed_whateveryouwant.jar)

Then i try to double click run and it says error loading…
Then i double click the jar i made error loading
Then double click the signed jar i made error loading

Error msg…
Sorry an error occured whilst loading telescape

[b]To fix this try the following in order

  1. Try closing all web browser windows and reloading.

2.Try clearing your web browsers cache from tools> internet options

3.Try using a different game world

4.Try rebooting your computer

5.Try selecting a different version of java from the play-game menu[/b]

Please help… i really want to get it to work

Read full topic
